mention.text: a real-life tall tale in `` Little Dieter Needs To Fly
a documentary that describes enough breakneck adventures for any action hero
the swashbuckler who is the film 's subject , Dieter Dengler , mostly
a comfortable life near San Francisco
hundreds of pounds of emergency provisions hidden under his house , just in case
the fun part of his life
